card_pen_effect: NAll Pendulum Monsters you control gain 300 ATK.
card_text: You can target 1 monster whose current ATK is different from its original ATK; apply the appropriate effect. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Cheermole" once per turn.$N●If that monster's current ATK is higher than its original ATK, it gains 1000 ATK.$N●If that monster's current ATK is lower than its original ATK, it loses 1000 ATK.
